nushi_jimen_030_friend_02:
What even WAS that thing, though?!\c
I kinda feel like...maybe I’ve seen it before
somewhere...[npcn:6]
nushi_jimen_030_friend_05:
Anyway, I bet if we head inside here, we’ll find
more of that Herba Mystica it was eating.[npcn:6]
nushi_jimen_030_friend_06:
Let’s give the place a once-over before that
thing decides to come back![npcn:6]
